title: Missing libisl when installing gcc@5.4.0 on system gcc@5.4.0
body:
Following the [`spack` install instructions](https://picongpu.readthedocs.io/en/latest/install/instructions/spack.html) for [`PIConGPU`](https://github.com/ComputationalRadiationPhysics/picongpu), an error occurs when installing `gcc` via
```
spack install gcc@5.4.0
```

### Expected Result

gcc 5.4.0 is installed succesfully

### Actual Result

```
==> Installing gcc
==> Fetching http://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/gcc/gcc-5.4.0/gcc-5.4.0.tar.bz2
[ ... ]
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j8'

6 errors found in build log:
[ ... ]
  >> 15250 /tmp/berceanu/spack-stage/spack-stage-e9ZEMa/gcc-5.4.0/spack-build/./gcc/cc1: error while loading shared libraries: libisl.so.13: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
[ ... ]
  >> 15370 checking for suffix of object files... configure: error: in `/tmp/berceanu/spack-stage/spack-stage-e9ZEMa/gcc-5.4.0/spack-build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/libgcc':
  >> 15371 configure: error: cannot compute suffix of object files: cannot compile
     15372 See `config.log' for more details.
     15373 Makefile:16271: recipe for target 'configure-stage2-target-libgcc' failed
  >> 15374 make[2]: *** [configure-stage2-target-libgcc] Error 1
     15375 make[2]: Leaving directory '/tmp/berceanu/spack-stage/spack-stage-e9ZEMa/gcc-5.4.0/spack-build'
     15376 Makefile:20856: recipe for target 'stage2-bubble' failed
  >> 15377 make[1]: *** [stage2-bubble] Error 2
     15378 make[1]: Leaving directory '/tmp/berceanu/spack-stage/spack-stage-e9ZEMa/gcc-5.4.0/spack-build'
     15379 Makefile:902: recipe for target 'all' failed
  >> 15380 make: *** [all] Error 2
```

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
git clone https://github.com/spack/spack.git $HOME/src/spack
source $HOME/src/spack/share/spack/setup-env.sh
spack bootstrap
spack install gcc@5.4.0
```
